Standard installation package

Your install is included in the price of the chargepoint if it meets our standard install criteria. If it doesn't, we'll provide a no obligation quote or a full refund if you don't want to proceed.

Select a connector

A connector is included in the price of your POD Point.

Universal Pod Point

Connects to any electric car, this Pod Point requires a separate cable which can be purchased below.

Read description

Although this Pod Point requires an additional cable, you're covered if you ever update your car in the future.

Fixed Cable Connector

Comes with a permanently attached cable for convenient charging.

Read description

This Pod Point has a 4.8m charging cable permanently attached. Unlike the universal socket, this Pod Point is not compatible with every car and you may need to upgrade should you change vehicle in the future.

Note, the 7.5m fixed cable extension can be purchased below if additional length is required.

Apply discounts

Claim the OLEV Grant

Do you want to reduce the cost of your chargepoint by £500, by claiming the OLEV Grant?

Claim now

You need to qualify for all of the below criteria in order to be eligible for the OLEV grant.

I ordered, own or lease an electric vehicle

My Vehicle was purchased after the 1st of April 2015
(If the vehicle is a company car, a letter from the company is required as evidence)

I have private, off-street parking at my domestic property

The cable, when run from the chargepoint to the car, will not cross a public right of way

Skip - close panel
OLEV grant not applied

Unfortunately you don't qualify for the OLEV grant if you answer 'no' to any of the eligibility questions. Please see Terms and conditions for more information.

Confirm eligibility for free standard installation

Our standard install for the homecharge POD Point covers the majority of home installs in the UK.

Standard installation terms

Standard Install

Our standard install for the homecharge POD Point covers the majority of home installs in the UK and includes:

  • Install of POD Point on a brick or plaster wall, or suitable permanent structure.
  • The fitting of correct electrical connections and protections.
  • An additional three way consumer unit, if required.
  • Up to 15 metres of cable, run between the distribution board/electricity meter and the POD Point.
  • The cable run will be clipped flush to the wall at a height of no more than 6ft, running above the ground.
  • Up to 15 metres of cable, run between the distribution board/electricity meter and the POD Point.
  • The cable run will be clipped flush to the wall at a height of no more than 6ft, running above the ground.
  • Cable run through a single wal, l no thicker than half a metre.
  • An earth rod in soft ground, if required.

Please note:

  • We assume that your electrical connection is in adequate condition and has sufficient available capacity.

What happens if you need extra works carried out?

  • Photos sent in advance: Work out a customer quote for any additional works.
  • Minor additional works: new quote issued on site, payment taken and work completed on same day (discount offered if quote is accepted on the same day).
  • Significant additional works: engineer site survey on day then project manager will contact within 5 working days with new quote.
  • In all of the above, if you choose not to go ahead you can get a full refund.

Please select any of the below that apply to you to confirm your eligibility for our standard installation package:

The distance between the POD Point and meter or consumer unit is not more than 15 metres.

The cable from the power to the unit will not need to be buried underground.

There is a wall to install the POD Point on next to where I park.

Tell us more about your install (optional)

To increase the likelyhood of your install going ahead on the day, please tell us a little more about your installation.

I live in a listed building.

I live in a block of garage.

I'd like the POD Point in my garage and there is already a consumer unit (fuse box) installed there.

The electricity meter + consumer unit (fuse board) is i n the middle of my house or upstairs.

Next

Questions

What if I don't meet the 'standard installation' eligibility criteria?

If you don't meet the criteria we may still be able to carry out the installation but you may incur an additional cost. We will get in touch with you to better understand your requirements and produce a no-obligation quote for the additional works. If you decide not to proceed we will any payment that you've already made.

Can I connect my POD Point to a plug socket?

No, in order to get a faster charge and to ensure it is properly protected we will need to connect the POD Point directly your consumer unit (fuse board) or electricity meter.

Can I purchase any kW charger for my EV?

Most domestic properties have single phase power which means the maximum charging rate is 7kW. The faster 22kW chargepoint is usually found in commercial properties where a three phase power supply exist.
